testcase.name: testgetQuestionsWithAllParameters
testcase.system-out: Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple When was Club Penguin launched? October 24, 2005[October 21, 2005, March 29, 2006, November 22, 2004] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple Sean Bean voices the character of "Martin Septim" in which Elder Scrolls game? The Elder Scrolls IV: Oblivion[The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, The Elder Scrolls III: Morrowind , The Elder Scrolls Online] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple Psych-Horror "Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem", developed by Silicon Knights in 2002, was published by who and on what platform? Nintendo® Co. Ltd. | GameCube™[Sony® Computer Entertainment™ Inc. | PlayStation® 2, Microsoft® Game Studios™ | XBox™, Sega® Enterprises Co. Ltd. | Dreamcast™] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple How many unique items does "Borderlands 2" claim to have? 87 Bazillion [87 Million, 87 Trillion, 87 Gazillion ] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In the game "Brawlhalla", what species is the character Bödvar is? Half Human / Half Bear[A Human, Half Wolf / Half Bear, Half Tiger / Half Human] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple What is the browser game Kantai Collection heavily inspired by? Second World War[Manga, World of Warcraft, An Anime] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple Which of the following Pokémon games released first? Pokémon Crystal[Pokémon Platinum, Pokémon FireRed, Pokémon Black] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In the first Left 4 Dead, you can play as either of these four characters. Francis, Bill, Zoey, and Louis[Bender, Andrew, Allison, and Brian, Coach, Ellis, Nick, and Rochelle, Harry, Ron, Hermione and Dumbledore] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In Touhou 12: Undefined Fantastic Object, which of these was not a playable character? Izayoi Sakuya[Hakurei Reimu, Kirisame Marisa, Kochiya Sanae] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In what year was "Super Mario Sunshine" released? 2002[2003, 2000, 2004]

testcase.name: testgetQuestions
testcase.system-out: Category Entertainment: Video Games Type boolean In Monster Hunter Generations, guild style is a type of hunting style. True[False] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple When was the Sega Genesis released in Japan? October 29, 1988[August 14, 1989, November 30, 1990, September 1, 1986] Category Geography Type multiple The Pyrenees mountains are located on the border of which two countries? France and Spain[Italy and Switzerland, Norway and Sweden, Russia and Ukraine] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In the game Enter the Gungeon, which one of these is not a playable character? The Wizard[The Bullet, The Robot, The Cultist] Category Science: Computers Type multiple The programming language 'Swift' was created to replace what other programming language? Objective-C[C#, Ruby, C++] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type boolean In "Sonic Adventure", you are able to transform into Super Sonic at will after completing the main story. False[True] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple In the "Ace Attorney" series, what is the relationship between Apollo Justice and Trucy Wright? They're half-siblings[They're co-workers, They're friends, They're both attorneys] Category Entertainment: Video Games Type multiple What game was used to advertise Steam? Counter-Strike 1.6[Half-Life, Half-Life 2, Team Fortress] Category Entertainment: Music Type boolean Michael Jackson wrote The Simpsons song "Do the Bartman". False[True] Category Entertainment: Japanese Anime & Manga Type multiple In the anime "My Hero Academia", which character is shown with the ability to manipulate gravity? Uraraka[Bakugo, Deku, Asui ]
